description.ko: VOID-3의 무한한 어둠 속으로의 하강, 심우주의 압도적인 압력과 고대 성운의 천상적인 빛이 만나는 곳입니다.
description.en: A descent into the infinite darkness of the VOID-3, where the crushing pressure of deep space meets the ethereal glow of ancient nebulae.

prompt: VOID-3 spacecraft drifting in the deepest reaches of the cosmos, cinematic wide angle, bioluminescent gas clouds, absolute black void background, ultra-realistic textures, 8k resolution, cold color palette with deep purples and indigos, hyper-detailed cosmic dust, sharp lighting effects.
